# [Interview #1160: Shadows of Self-Oak Brook, IL, Entry #22](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1160#22)

#### Question

Was Odium's original purpose to neutralize the threat of Adonalsium?

#### Brandon Sanderson

No. Good question.
